comment: Dr. Park was very responsive to emails. She gives student's great feedback and also gave us the opportunity to redo assignments that did not receive satisfactory grades. I would definitely take Dr. Park again.

Dr. Park is one of the best professors I had. She gives good feedback and is very cooperative. The only drawback is that she gives a lot of homework. Apart from that she is great. Will take her other classes in future too.
Dr. Park is a great teacher and very skillful in inspiring students' interest. She is very helpful in aiding in assignments. Dr. Park is the best instructor ever.

Dr. Park is a friendly and wonderful teacher. She taught us IT Service Delivery, course content was quite new to me but proper group activities and lecture slides gave me confidence in class. She was also available to students before and after class for questions regarding lectures.  Would surely take up another class with Dr. Park in futures.
I took 2 classes with Dr Park, and I enjoyed learning with her approach.  She is helpful and caring. Look forward to another class with her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: I loved her course. The course was the most interesting courses I've ever taken. The work kept me involved the more we went on.
Amazing lecturer, She is one of my favorite.
